title: Entity Type
description: Specifies the structure of a Block Protocol entity type

$id.title: Versioned URL
$id.description: The versioned URL of a Block Protocol ontology type (the $id of the schema). It should be of the form `${baseUrl}v/${versionNumber}`
$id.x-$comment: The version number must be a valid unsigned 32-bit integer, that is, between 0 and 4,294,967,295 (inclusive).

$ref.x-$comment: The versioned URL of a entity type (the $id of the entity type's schema)

allOf.x-$comment: Present if this entity type is a link entity type.

properties.title: Property Type Object
properties.description: A JSON object where each entry is constrained by a property type.

oneOf.title: Property Type Reference
oneOf.description: A reference to a property type.

$ref.title: Versioned URL
$ref.description: The versioned URL of a Block Protocol ontology type (the $id of the schema). It should be of the form `${baseUrl}v/${versionNumber}`
$ref.$comment: The version number must be a valid unsigned 32-bit integer, that is, between 0 and 4,294,967,295 (inclusive).

items.title: Property Type Reference
items.description: A reference to a property type.

$ref.title: Versioned URL
$ref.description: The versioned URL of a Block Protocol ontology type (the $id of the schema). It should be of the form `${baseUrl}v/${versionNumber}`
$ref.$comment: The version number must be a valid unsigned 32-bit integer, that is, between 0 and 4,294,967,295 (inclusive).

items.$comment: Property object values must be defined through references to the full Versioned URL of the same property type used for the property name.

x-propertyNames.$comment: Property names must be a valid Base URL to a property type
x-propertyNames.title: Base URL
x-propertyNames.description: The base URL of a Block Protocol ontology type (the $id of the schema, without the versioned suffix). It should a valid URL, with a trailing slash.

items.title: Base URL
items.description: The base URL of a Block Protocol ontology type (the $id of the schema, without the versioned suffix). It should a valid URL, with a trailing slash.
Specifies a set of entity types inside a oneOf
